page.title: 13SATURDAY IN AYLESFORD
page.content: The day begins with the soft footsteps of my Grandmother going to the bathroom at 6am.At 7-30am I wake,go downstairs & watch Wide Awake Club a T.V. programme which lasts an hour & a half.At 9-00am my parents come down & Mum makes breakfast.Sometimes we have a fried breakfast & other times we have toast.At 9-30am we get dressed,then Dad takes me to football. I play for Aylesford & my School. My Mum does the washing until 10-30am when she goes to Waitrose which is a massive Supermarket in Maidstone.We all get back at 12-00. The rest of the day is spent being utterly lazy.At 6-00 we watch T.V. until 9-30pm when Joel & I go upstairs to bed.
